content: I'm in love with this collection! In love with the sparkly red packaging so chic and fun to pull out of my purse and reapply the lipstick. I love every thing about this collection and my daughter too is crazy about it. I'm so happy I got em this season. I will be wearing them this holiday season & my upcoming European vacation.
title: I'm in love with this collection!

name: x Patrickstarrr Eye Shadow x 6: Oh, Holy Eyes
